xwikidoc.name: RecentlyVisited
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content: #set($recentlyViewed = $xwiki.getRecentActions("view", 5)) #if($recentlyViewed.size() > 0) #panelheader("Recently Visited") #set($first = true) #foreach($docname in $recentlyViewed) #set($rdoc = $xwiki.getDocument($docname).getTranslatedDocument()) #if($first == true) #set($first = false) #else | #end $rdoc.displayTitle #end #panelfooter() #end
